alert.note: Alert for Kuskokwim Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 20 at 11:51AM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKDT SUNDAY AROUND BETHEL ALONG BROWNS SLOUGH... * WHAT...Flooding caused by elevated water levels due to an ice jam. * WHERE...Including the Browns Slough along the Kuskokwim River in Bethel. * WHEN...Until noon AKDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Businesses along Hangar Lake Road may experience minor flooding. Water over roadways is likely along with water ponding in poor drainage areas. Tidal influences may exacerbate flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1146 AM AKDT, The River Watch Team reports an ice jam on the Kuskokwim River downstream of Bethel. Impounding water due to the ice jam will cause rapid river rises upstream. - For Kuskokwim River at Bethel: At 11:00am the stage was 9.28 feet. Flood Stage is 8.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood - If you live or work along Browns Slough, stay alert and be prepared to take action.
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
